activities:
TalentWise provides consumer background check reports for businesses engaged in screening applicants for employment (including employment, promotion, retention, volunteer or independent contractor assignments, as applicable) or tenant screening purposes.

Applicants reside in countries throughout the world including the EU and Switzerland.  We collect from applicants only the necessary data to perform these background investigations, including personally identifying information such as their name, surname, date of birth, address, SSN, tax ID number, school or work ID number, and other information.  Prior to performing background checks the client is required to disclose to the applicant the nature of the investigation and obtain their authorization for the background check.  We use this information only for the purpose of performing the authorized screening and conduct such in accordance with the Fair Credit Reporting Act and Safe Harbor Privacy Principles  

Personal information submitted to TalentWise for a background screening investigation may at times be transferred outside of the United States and shared with globally based, including the EU and Switzerland, third-party researchers in order to perform the background investigation.  Background investigation data and results from these third party companies may then be transferred to TalentWise, and ultimately to its client,  as part of the completed background report. All personal information is transmitted, stored, and retained, in a secure manner and in accordance with the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-line, offline, and manually processed data
recoursemech: Private sector developed dispute resolution mechanism that incorporate the Safe Harbor frameworks - TRUSTe
